author: jsoref
body:
While these changes technically impact the build, they should be debug only changes that only impact debugging failure cases. There are also only a handful of them which should make review easy.

This is PR 6 of N.

These can definitely be squashed together. I'm slowly peeling them out from other categories...

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
Hi **@jsoref**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution! You've already signed the contribution license agreement. Thanks!

The agreement was validated by Microsoft and real humans are currently evaluating your PR.

TTYL, MSBOT;

comments.author: vors
comments.body: I really like these spelling fixes. Thank you @jsoref for doing it!

comments.author: jsoref
comments.body: @vors : I've stripped out those two items.

comments.author: vors
comments.body: @jsoref can you open a separate PR for the public filed renaming thing?

comments.author: jsoref
comments.body: @vors, I have three more PRs to produce: local variables, public APIs, and string resource names. I might get the locals up tonight. It's a slow process teasing the three apart.

title: spelling: debug...
